location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Captain George Brown Walker, Senior Marine Officer in the Gulf of Persia

mods.abstract: Stannus writes regarding the despatch of the cruizer Nautilusto Bombay and informs that Lieutenant Kinchant has been directed to touch at Bassidore [Bāsa‘īdū] for the purpose of taking charge of Walker's letters for the Residency.
